attributes.comment: Women must retain the right to review information about and select providers of the same sex. Sex must be defined as biological sex as observed/recorded at birth. The Directory must provide clear information about the biological sex of patients and providers and should remove unverifiable and medically irrelevant information about “gender identity." Alternatively, the Directory could choose to continue providing this information, insofar as something unverifiable can be accurately updated, but this must be done completely separately from information about sex, which is immutable, verifiable, and essential information for both female and male patients.

displayProperties.name: pageCount

attributes.title: Comment on CMS-2022-0163-0001
